# @param {Integer[]} colors
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def number_of_alternating_groups(colors, k)
  colors += colors[0, k]
  n = colors.size
  count = 0
  prefix_diffs = Array.new(n + 1, 0)

  (1...n).each do |i|
    prefix_diffs[i] = prefix_diffs[i - 1] + (colors[i] - colors[i - 1]).abs
  end

  k -= 1
  (k + 1...n).each do |i|
    if prefix_diffs[i] - prefix_diffs[i - k] == k
      count += 1
    end
  end

  count
end
